mapper.select: SELECT A.NO AS NO, DEPARTMENT_NO, B.NAME AS DEPARTMENT_NAME, C.NAME AS RANK_NAME, D.NAME AS POSITION_NAME, E.NAME AS STATE_NAME, AGENT, F.EMPLOY_DIVISION AS DIVISION_NAME, ID, PWD, A.NAME AS NAME, GENDER, BIRTH_DATE, PROFILE, LINE_INTRO, ADDRESS, PHONE, MAIL, REGISTRATION_DATE, LEAVE_REASON, LEAVE_DATE, OFFICE_NUMBER, LEAVE_COUNT, CAPACITY FROM "USER" A JOIN DEPARTMENT B ON A.DEPARTMENT_NO = B.NO JOIN RANK C ON A.RANK_NO = C.NO JOIN POSITION D ON A.POSITION_NO = D.NO JOIN USER_STATE E ON A.STATE_NO = E.NO JOIN EMPLOY_DIVISION F ON A.DIVISION_NO = F.NO WHERE NOT STATE_NO = 3

SELECT A.NO AS NO, DEPARTMENT_NO, B.NAME AS DEPARTMENT_NAME, C.NAME AS RANK_NAME, C.GRADE AS GRADE, E.NAME AS STATE_NAME, A.NAME AS NAME FROM "USER" A JOIN DEPARTMENT B ON A.DEPARTMENT_NO = B.NO JOIN RANK C ON A.RANK_NO = C.NO JOIN POSITION D ON A.POSITION_NO = D.NO JOIN USER_STATE E ON A.STATE_NO = E.NO JOIN EMPLOY_DIVISION F ON A.DIVISION_NO = F.NO WHERE NOT STATE_NO = 3 ORDER BY GRADE

SELECT A.NO AS NO, DEPARTMENT_NO, B.NAME AS DEPARTMENT_NAME, C.NAME AS RANK_NAME, D.NAME AS POSITION_NAME, E.NAME AS STATE_NAME, AGENT, F.EMPLOY_DIVISION AS DIVISION_NAME, A.NAME AS NAME, GENDER, BIRTH_DATE, PROFILE, LINE_INTRO, ADDRESS, PHONE, MAIL, REGISTRATION_DATE, OFFICE_NUMBER, LEAVE_COUNT FROM "USER" A JOIN DEPARTMENT B ON A.DEPARTMENT_NO = B.NO JOIN RANK C ON A.RANK_NO = C.NO JOIN POSITION D ON A.POSITION_NO = D.NO JOIN USER_STATE E ON A.STATE_NO = E.NO JOIN EMPLOY_DIVISION F ON A.DIVISION_NO = F.NO WHERE A.NO = #{userNo}

SELECT A.NO AS NO, DEPARTMENT_NO, B.D_NAME1, B.D_NAME2, B.D_NAME3, B.D_NAME4, C.NAME AS RANK_NAME, D.NAME AS POSITION_NAME, E.NAME AS STATE_NAME, AGENT, F.EMPLOY_DIVISION AS DIVISION_NAME, ID, PWD, A.NAME AS NAME, GENDER, BIRTH_DATE, PROFILE, LINE_INTRO, ADDRESS, PHONE, MAIL, REGISTRATION_DATE, LEAVE_REASON, LEAVE_DATE, OFFICE_NUMBER, LEAVE_COUNT, CAPACITY FROM "USER" A JOIN ( SELECT D.NO AS TOP_MOST_NO, A.NAME AS D_NAME1, B.NAME AS D_NAME2, C.NAME AS D_NAME3, D.NAME AS D_NAME4 FROM DEPARTMENT A RIGHT JOIN DEPARTMENT B ON A.NO = B.UPPER_DEPARTMENT_NO RIGHT JOIN DEPARTMENT C ON B.NO = C.UPPER_DEPARTMENT_NO RIGHT JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON C.NO = D.UPPER_DEPARTMENT_NO ) B ON A.DEPARTMENT_NO = B.TOP_MOST_NO JOIN RANK C ON A.RANK_NO = C.NO JOIN POSITION D ON A.POSITION_NO = D.NO JOIN USER_STATE E ON A.STATE_NO = E.NO JOIN EMPLOY_DIVISION F ON A.DIVISION_NO = F.NO WHERE A.NO = #{userNo}

SELECT COUNT(NO) FROM "USER" WHERE STATE_NO = '1'
AND ${searchType} LIKE '%${searchValue}%'

SELECT U.NO , U.DEPARTMENT_NO , D.NAME AS DEPARTMENT_NAME , U.RANK_NO , R.NAME AS RANK_NAME , U.POSITION_NO , U.STATE_NO , U.AGENT , U.DIVISION_NO , U.ID , U.PWD , U.NAME , U.GENDER , U.BIRTH_DATE , U.PROFILE , U.LINE_INTRO , U.ADDRESS , U.PHONE , U.MAIL , U.REGISTRATION_DATE , U.LEAVE_REASON , U.LEAVE_DATE , U.OFFICE_NUMBER , U.LEAVE_COUNT , U.CAPACITY FROM "USER" U JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON U.DEPARTMENT_NO = D.NO JOIN RANK R ON U.RANK_NO = R.NO WHERE STATE_NO = '1'
AND U.${searchType} LIKE '%${searchValue}%'
ORDER BY U.NO DESC

SELECT U.NO , U.DEPARTMENT_NO , D.NAME AS DEPARTMENT_NAME , R.NAME AS RANK_NAME , U.POSITION_NO , U.STATE_NO , U.AGENT , U.DIVISION_NO , U.ID , U.PWD , U.NAME , U.GENDER , U.BIRTH_DATE , U.PROFILE , U.LINE_INTRO , U.ADDRESS , U.PHONE , U.MAIL , U.REGISTRATION_DATE , U.LEAVE_REASON , U.LEAVE_DATE , U.OFFICE_NUMBER , U.LEAVE_COUNT , U.CAPACITY FROM "USER" U JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON U.DEPARTMENT_NO = D.NO JOIN RANK R ON U.RANK_NO = R.NO WHERE ID = #{id}
SELECT NAME, DEPARTMENT_NO FROM "USER" WHERE NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

SELECT "USER".NO, "USER".NAME, MAIL, PROFILE, "RANK".NAME AS RANK_NAME, GRADE, B.D_NAME1, B.D_NAME2, B.D_NAME3, B.D_NAME4 FROM "USER" JOIN "RANK" ON "USER".RANK_NO = "RANK".NO JOIN ( SELECT D.NO AS TOP_MOST_NO, A.NAME AS D_NAME1, B.NAME AS D_NAME2, C.NAME AS D_NAME3, D.NAME AS D_NAME4 FROM DEPARTMENT A RIGHT JOIN DEPARTMENT B ON A.NO = B.UPPER_DEPARTMENT_NO RIGHT JOIN DEPARTMENT C ON B.NO = C.UPPER_DEPARTMENT_NO RIGHT JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON C.NO = D.UPPER_DEPARTMENT_NO ) B ON "USER".DEPARTMENT_NO = B.TOP_MOST_NO WHERE "USER".NO = #{no}
